comment: There have been known cases of someone being arrested for loli in the US. of those arrested were investigated for CP and did have it. person wasn't willing to fight his charges. And one was suspected of having CP but didn't have it and the state and feds had no interest in charging him for loli and as RELEASED. Torba cares more about loli than law enforcement.

                              :ARG2 (c4 / charge-05

            :snt4 (c5 / care-01
